item.title: A better Rust menu interface
item.description: Rust’s menu interface is in need of an overhaul. The most heavily used screen — the server browser — functions the most poorly of all, so I’ve had a crack at improving it. It’s difficult to find a server in Rust. When you find yourself using a 3rd party website (shouts to battlemetrics) to find a decent server something is clearly up.
